main_content.en: Orange(beta) helps you organize your study and learning process so you can meet your goal more quickly and efficiently.

main_content2.en: Its your very own personal manager/coach that will help you organize your daily goals, notes and learning videos in one application! Give it a try today!

login_error.en: Could not login you in at this time!

user_exits.en: Opps! An account with this E-mail already exist!

signup_error.en: Could not sign you up at this time. Please try again later!

user_not_found.en: No user found with the provided E-mail address

sign_up_success.en: Welcome {name} to Orange. Your trial period ends in 15 days. Sign in and begin your journey to success!

trial_expired.en: Your trial period has expired!! You can continue with our services for just 5 oranges per month!

empty_todo.en: Your todo list is empty! Click the '+' icon to add a new todo!

empty_notes_message.en: You have no notes yet! Click the '+' icon to take notes!

empty_video_message.en: You have no Videos saved yet! Click the '+' icon to start your playlist!

empty_videoPlayer_message.en: You have no Videos in your play list! Click the '+' icon to add videos!

empty_reports.en: Reports are not implemented yet.. coming up next!

signup_failed.en: Your Registration to Orange failed. Please contact admin or try again later.
